text: On the night of my birthday in freshman year my friends AND their friends all surprised me at the res hall’s front door. I almost cried because it was the first time I ever had a surprise birthday, let alone a surprise birthday from a **group of friends**. It made me fill up with feelings of love and gratitude—I finally felt like I belonged **somewhere**.
I knew it was Goran when I saw "fun academic *exercise*" xD
